item.description:
While the arrival of fall used to herald the return to academia, now it's just another season. Why not recreate that back-to-school feeling with some good old fashioned professional development?

The McGill Alumni Association of Boston is hosting a networking event that will let you sharpen your skills while connecting with other movers and shakers in the Boston area.

This event is a wonderful opportunity to meet and reconnect with fellow grads in a meaningful way, and to stay up-to-date with notable alumni and their professional endeavors.

We look forward to seeing you there!

Speakers:

Dr. Noubar Afeyan, BEng (Chem) '83

Managing Partner and CEO of Flagship Ventures

Dr. James McArthur, BSc '84, PhD '89, Molecular Oncology

Chief Scientific Officer at Synovex Corporation

Schedule:

6 - Reception begins
6:30 - Interview with a Guest Speakers
7 - Formal Networking (structured)
7:45 - Mix and Mingle
8:30 - Close of Evening

For more information: boston.alumni@mcgill.ca
https://www.alumni.mcgill.ca/aoc/events-travel/EventDetails.php?id=MTUwNzE%3D

SPECIAL PRICING:

Advanced ticket for $15
Advanced ticket for TWO people for $25
At-the-door ticket for $25

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: McGill Boston Professionals - Night of 1821 Connections
